author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bristol-Myers Squibb Elects Each Of Company's 12 Nominees To Serve As Directors
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Bristol-Myers Squibb Co:
* BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB CO - SHAREHOLDERS ELECTED EACH OF COMPANYâ€™S 12 NOMINEES TO SERVE AS DIRECTORS OF COMPANY UNTIL 2019 ANNUAL MEETING
* BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB CO - SHAREHOLDER PROPOSAL TO LOWER SHARE OWNERSHIP THRESHOLD TO CALL SPECIAL SHAREHOLDER MEETINGS WAS NOT APPROVED
* BRISTOL-MYERS - PROPOSAL ON DISCLOSING RISKS RELATED TO CONCERN OVER DRUG PRICING STRATEGIES INCORPORATED INTO INCENTIVE COMPENSATION PLANS WAS NOT APPROVED Source text ( bit.ly/2Ku4J9L )
